sentences.sContent: She made no stay at the stairs'-head, but mounted farther, to the garret where Heathcliff was confined, and called him.
sentences.sContent_eng: She made no stay at the stairs'-head, but mounted farther, to the garret where Heathcliff was confined, and called him.
sentences.sCn: 她并没有在楼梯顶停下来，而是向更上面走去，走向关着希斯克利夫的阁楼，并叫他的名字。

sentences.sContent: Oh, I hope you'll die in a garret!
sentences.sContent_eng: Oh, I hope you'll die in a garret!
sentences.sCn: 啊，我希望你死在阁楼上，活活饿死！

trans.tranOther: a small uncomfortable room at the top of a house, just under the roof
